title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, RAG, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing models in Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool with prompt templates, conversation history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with 30+ recipes: PDF RAG, function calling, structured extraction, Docker stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to install and run Ollama declaratively on NixOS or via flakes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker Compose file.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama chat responses into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with thread streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger pipeline module to build, push and test Ollama models in CI/CD.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama with session memory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas and answer questions via Ollama.

title: ollama-minecraft
summary: Minecraft mod that adds an in-game AI assistant powered by a local Ollama model.
